DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare long-term efficacy safety entecavir 1.0 mg/d + adefovir 10 mg/d entecavir 0.5 mg/d + adefovir 10 mg/d chronic hepatitis B patient inadequate response NUC therapy
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Optimizing Extension Study Chronic Hepatitis B Patients With Inadequate Response NUC Therapy
